description: a filling snack bread to satisfy even the hungriest of hobbits
ingredients: 1/2 c flour, 2 tbsp water, handfull of seeds
instructions: mix together into a paste and bake at 350 for 10 minutes

description: the only thing to drink at the end of a hard day of spell casting
ingredients: 1/2 c pumpkin, 1 cup apple juice, sprinkle of cinnamon
instructions: shake in a jar with ice and strain. serve with a pumpkin pastie
